title: Asian Art Topics: National, Religious, and Intellectual Movements
description: In-depth examination of significant art movements in Asia. Each topic will focus on the development of art in Asia within the context of a specific geographical or theoretical framework. Details will vary depending on topic. The Schedule of Classes will list topic selected. Total credit limited to 12 units. 4 lectures. Fulfills GE C4 except for Art and Design majors.
prerequisites: Junior standing; completion of GE Areas A and C3
